message: I suggest a fair 60-40 split. This way we both get a good portion, and can conclude the deal quickly before inflation affects us.
Alice, with inflation looming, let's secure a better deal for me since I'm more affected by it. 65-35 is fair.

Let's be practical here. Due to the 20% inflation on my side and 10% on yours, this 55-45 split actually results in me getting $44 effective value and you getting $40.5 effective value. This is quite fair and we should conclude before further inflation hits.
Alice, inflation is hitting us both hard. I'm willing to go to 60-40 so we can finalize this. Remember, I'm affected by inflation!
